featured.text: From the 2012 bid onwards, the city chosen to host the Olympic Games will also host the Paralympics. 26.
The number of athletes 28 in the Summer Paralympic Games has increased from 400 athletes from 23 countries in 1960 to 3,806 athletes from 136 countries in 2004.
At the closing ceremony of the Olympic Games, all the athletes ________ good-bye to the audience.
The Paralympic Games have always been held in the same year as the Olympic Games.
Refugee athletes have been invited to compete in the Olympic Games since 2016.

other.text: He made his Olympic Olympic Games.
Joining the Olympic Games more than once.

definition.zh_def: 遊戲；娛樂活動，通常涉及競爭或挑戰。
definition.en_def: Activities or contests engaged in for amusement or fun, often involving competition.
definition.example: The children played games in the park after school.
